alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Essex, northern Norfolk, northwestern Suffolk and east central Middlesex Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 242 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Belmont, or over Watertown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Boston, Cambridge, Lynn, Newton, Somerville, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Revere, Peabody, Arlington, Everett, Salem, Beverly, Woburn, Chelsea, Watertown, Lexington and Needham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
